thread.title_full: PSC Recommends Improvements To OMB Cybersecurity Acquisition Guidance

title: PSC Recommends Improvements To OMB Cybersecurity Acquisition Guidance
text:
15 PSC Recommends Improvements To OMB Cybersecurity Acquisition Guidance 
Homeland Security Today: The Professional Services Council (PSC) has raised significant concerns about the Office of Management and Budget’s (OMB’s) draft cybersecurity acquisition guidance in a letter PSC sent to Federal CIO Tony Scott and OMB Office of Federal Procurement Policy Administrator Anne Rung last week.
